message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth $95. Let me know if this works for you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get a better deal.
Thank you for your interest, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to pay more. Based on that, I would like to offer the product to you for $75. I hope this price works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $72.50. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
